text: Yosiya nakawegala watambika kulawa kuli miji jeng'ha ja Yuda na kuhadita honhu ha kufugamila milungu hawe hakokomoche, kwaluchila Geba mbaka Beeli-sheba, honhu heng'ha hawele watambika wa milungu nawafunyiza ubani. Nakahabomola honhu ha kufugamila milungu hawele hali lwizi lwa Yoshua, chilongozi wa muji, luwele ubanzi wa kumoso mwa lwizi lwa muji.
